descripcion:
Description
Do you like working in a highly challenging and international environment? Do you love challenges and being a part of future-oriented projects? Then you’ve come to the right place!
You’ll be leading long-term projects for world-class builders. So read on and discover what we have to offer.
hsbcad equals flexible offsite construction software solutions to global construction companies specialized in timber construction. To support our very rapid growth in this globally expanding market, we are looking for an Senior Software Engineer.
Skills & Experience
· You love tackling complex software challenges. You love analysis and development. 3+ years of development experience is very welcome.
· You are an experienced professional who can handle complex projects autonomously.
· It goes without saying that you have a good understanding of the Programming Languages C # / C++.
· We need team players. You will be pair-programming with your fellow experts in an international environment and sparring with them regularly to decide the best path forward in our projects.
· You are an open communicator. You will continuously optimize your skills with us; we are mainly looking for the right can-do attitude.
· You speak and write fluent English. Any other language is an asset.
Responsibilities
· You will take the lead in participating in the technical analysis of our customers’ requests to fine-tune the applications to be developed as per their business requirements.
· You and your team will use the programming language C # / C++.
· You will also ensure high-quality standards for the code written by your team.
· You’ll be responsible for maintaining your code base and thus increasing the quality of the applications.
· You will make sure that application documentation is drafted to simplify the change process of the developed applications for our customers.
Next Steps
· Our agile environment will allow you to take on a lot of autonomy and responsibility.
· You can count on an extensive onboarding and training period of 3 to 6 months to learn the insights of the hsbcad products.
· We can offer you an open-door but highly professional environment where we work together on world-class, international, and BIM-compliant projects in an informal and human-centered environment.
Do you want to learn more about the awe-inspiring projects we work on? Read all about it here.
And last but not least, we offer you a competitive salary, topped with extensive fringe benefits.
If you are enthusiastic to be part of our company, please send your CV and wage aspiration. Do you like working in a highly challenging and international environment?
